</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enables or disables a trait or alters a trait of the given unit. Custom trait can only be a [[Bool|bool]].<br><br>
Default traits are:
*[[Number]] '''audibleCoef''' - A lower value means the unit is harder to hear
*[[Number]] '''camouflageCoef''' - A lower value means the unit is harder to spot
*[[Number]] '''loadCoef''' - Equipment weight multiplier affecting fatigue and stamina
*[[Boolean]] '''engineer''' - Ability to partially repair vehicles with toolkit, equivalent to <tt>engineer <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 1;</tt> in [[CfgVehicles_Config_Reference|CfgVehicles]]
*[[Boolean]] '''explosiveSpecialist''' - Ability to defuse mines with toolkit, equivalent to <tt>canDeactivateMines <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 1;</tt> in CfgVehicles
*[[Boolean]] '''medic''' - Ability to treat self and others with medikit, equivalent to <tt>attendant <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 1;</tt> in CfgVehicles
*[[Boolean]] '''UAVHacker''' - Ability to hack drones, equivalent to <tt>uavHacker <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 1;</tt> in CfgVehicles

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>unit [[setUnitTrait]] [skillName, value, isCustom]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - The unit whose trait should be set
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> skillName: [[String]] - Name of the skill
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> value: [[Boolean]] or [[Number]] - Value (see above)
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> isCustom (optional): [[Boolean]] - Must be set to [[true]] in case of custom</value></part><part><name/>=<value> Param 4
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> Nothing
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[setUnitTrait]] ["Medic",[[true]]];</code>
</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[getUnitTrait]] [[getAllUnitTraits]]
</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>
</value></part></template>
